dcterms:creator: F. J. Masci
E. J. G. Pitman
R. Carrasco-Davis
P. Sánchez-Sáez
E. L. Wright
dcterms:description: The Zwicky Transient Facility (ZTF) is a time-domain survey that generates a stream of image stamps of 63 × 63 pixels centered around detected astronomical events, along with metadata such as position, flux magnitude, and observation time.
dcterms:title: Zwicky Transient Facility (ZTF) alerts

dcterms:creator: E. L. Wright
dcterms:description: The AllWISE catalog provides photometric data from the Wide-field Infrared Survey Explorer (WISE) mission, which is used to enhance the classification of astronomical objects by providing additional color information.
dcterms:title: AllWISE catalog

dcterms:creator: P. Sánchez-Sáez
dcterms:description: ALeRCE broker data includes alerts processed by the ALeRCE system, which classifies astronomical events using machine learning techniques based on light curves and metadata.
dcterms:title: ALeRCE broker data

dcterms:creator: R. Carrasco-Davis
dcterms:description: The Original Stamp Classifier data consists of alerts from the ZTF survey, focusing on the first detection of astronomical events and using a convolutional neural network for classification.
dcterms:title: Original Stamp Classifier data
